alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Houston County through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taylor, or near Dothan. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dothan, Taylor, Cowarts, Rehobeth, Avon, Memphis, Olympia Spa Resort, Wilson Mill and Ardilla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
